title: Trump Just Made a Joke About Having Sex With Models in the Middle of Coronavirus Briefing
text:
Politics - News Analysis Trump Just Made a Joke About Having Sex With Models in the Middle of Coronavirus Briefing

At Friday’s White House coronavirus task force briefing, Donald Trump shared the new CDC recommendation that Americans should wear non-medical face coverings to help slow the spread of the coronavirus, and then made a bizarre joke about banging models.

“The CDC is advising the use of non-medical cloth face covering as an additional voluntary public health measure,” Trump said. “So it’s voluntary. You don’t have to do it. They suggest for it a period of time.”

The president emphasized, “But this is voluntary. I don’t think I’m going to be doing it.”

“The CDC is recommending that Americans wear a basic cloth or fabric mass that can be purchased online or simply made at home, probably material that you have at home. These face coverings can be easily washed or reused,” Trump continued. “I want to emphasize that the CDC is not recommending the use of medical-grade or surgical-grade masks. We want that to be used for our great medical people that are working so hard and doing some job.

Trump then was talking about coronavirus models, and quipped that he wasn’t involved in these models…but other kind of models.

Stay up-to-date with the latest news!

Subscribe and start recieving our daily emails. Subscribe By subscribing, you agree to receive emails from PoliticalFlare.com, occasional offers from our partners and that you've read and agree to our privacy policy and legal statement

Yes, Trump jokes about having sex with models and Twitter was grossed out:

OH MY FUCKING GOD. Trump says "the models say 100,000 people could die. I've never been involved in the model. At least not *that* kind of model." He's cracking jokes about banging supermodels in the same breath as talking about a six figure death count. REMOVE HIM. — Elizabeth C. McLaughlin 🩸🦷 (@ECMcLaughlin) April 3, 2020

Trump slips in a joke about banging a model into his discussion of mass mortality. — Josh Marshall (@joshtpm) April 3, 2020

Trump just said in a press conference that he wasn't involved in the Covid-19 models and then says "well, not those kids of models" and grins. Are you effing serious? #StopAiringTrump #ResignNow #TrumpIsTheWORSTPresidentEVER — Megan Bowers (@livingpink12) April 3, 2020

"I want to come under the model. I've never been involved with models. Well, not this kind of a model…" That's your guy, puritanical evangelicals. #Trump #COVID19 #COVID19Pandemic #coronavirus #TrumpPressBriefing — Irrev. Paul Baudhuin (@BelgianFriar) April 3, 2020

The President of the United States just made a joke about being involved with models, in the very same breath as saying the death toll could be hundreds of thousands, at the pandemic press conference.#COVID19 #Trump #CNN — HollyHox (@HollHox) April 3, 2020

Trump 'I was never involved in making the models. at least not these kinds of models' and he chuckles. SERIOUSLY dumbfuck @realDonaldTrump when discussing the number of people that will DIE, YOU DON'T MAKE FUCKING OBSCENE JOKES ABOUT FUCKING MODELS. #TrumpPressBriefing — Jinxie Clark (RESISTANCE) (@JinxieClark1) April 3, 2020

"I was never involved with a model, at least this kind of a model." Donald Trump, President during #CoronavirusPandemic press conference. He is disgusting and incompetent. — Meryl #FreeThemAll (@merylnyc) April 3, 2020

Did Trump just make a joke about being into female models while answering a question about the government's projection that more than 100,000 Americans will die because of this pandemic? "I was never involved with a model. At least this kind of a model," the president says. — James Hohmann (@jameshohmann) April 3, 2020
